title: Thai peanut sauce
ingredients: ['75g roasted, salted peanuts', '2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '1 tablespoon toasted sesame oil', '1 teaspoon chilli oil', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '4 teaspoons fresh lime juice', '1 tablespoon caster sugar or to taste', '1 teaspoon chilli garlic sauce or to taste']
